actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Act to provide that the receipt of military retirement pay shall not cause benefits under that act to be diminished.

summary.text: Provides that the receipt of military retirement pay shall not cause benefits under the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Act to be diminished. (Adds 45 U.S.C. 354(f))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Act to provide that the receipt of military retirement pay shall not cause benefits under that act to be diminished.
